Description: You are stationed on the Space Z Station in low earth orbit.

Rooms.Name: Living Quarters
Rooms.Description: The living room has items scattered everywhere. The alarm is blaring in the background.

objects.name: keycard
objects.description: A keycard used to access restricted areas.

Rooms.Name: Escape Pod Room
Rooms.Description: You enter the escape pod room to find only one pod left. The loud alarm continues to deafen you.

Rooms.Name: Engine Room
Rooms.Description: A massive engine used to power the station, but it is currently shut off.

Rooms.Name: Airlock
Rooms.Description: The airlock appears to be intact. Thank god, you don't want to get sucked into space.

Rooms.Name: Control Room
Rooms.Description: A large control panel in the middle of  the room, controlling all aspects of the ship. Maybe you can use it to turn off the alarm.

objects.name: control_panel
objects.description: A panel that controls the alarms. It looks complicated.
